Jan. ‘26: What I’ve been listening to lately

Ninajirachi - I love my computer

I wish I could see Ninajirachi at Coachella this year. Also recommended listening: Fuck my computer - Frost Children remix

Pedro Sampaio - SEQUÊNCIAS #1

Literally every song on this album is a banger. But if I had to pick one, it would be Sequencia Cunt. They way they get that bass distortion on “Sequencia Striptease” is incredible.

Sevdaliza - HEROINA

This album literally changed my life.

Cinnamon Chasers - “love the way you ruin me” and “MissU”

Wu Bai - “Last Dance”

Balu Brigada - “Backseat” and “Politix”

Published on January 31, 2026
